comments.content:
Or [Palatino Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174136/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/palatino/bold/testdrive.html?s=Smurfit-Stone&p=48), this is the Linotype version.   
   
I had to do some work for another part of the Smurfit goup and seem to recall dragging the logo from a \*.pdf file in the financial reports section of their site.   
   
BTW, I wonder where Monotype got the inspiration for Book Antiqua?
